synopsis.text:
He's a high school prodigy with a paintbrush, but lately, Asou Daisuke's canvas has been as blank as his inspiration. With a creative block stifling his artistic flow, Daisuke finds himself under mounting pressure as a prestigious art competition looms, offering a scholarship to the most gifted artist. To complicate matters, his childhood friend, Tachibana Amane, watches in distress as Daisuke struggles to rediscover his passion for painting.

Enter Kimikage Yurina, a young girl with a delicate heart, and Daisuke's new neighbor, who also happens to be his first love and now his teacher. As Amane persuades Daisuke to paint a portrait of Yurina before her surgery, the stage is set for a journey of self-discovery, love, and artistic rekindling.

But the story doesn't end there. Daisuke's stepsister Ren, along with a growing number of girls from his past, begin to appear, each showing an unusual level of concern for him. As the chaos unfolds, Daisuke must navigate the complexities of his relationships and find his muse in time to achieve his lifelong dream. Will he rise above the challenges and create a masterpiece worthy of the scholarship, or will the pressure prove to be too much for this gifted artist? Only time will tell in this heartwarming tale of love, friendship, and the power of artistic expression.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
